data.title: Ribeirão das Neves Smoking Friendly Vacation Rentals - State of Minas Gerais, Brazil
data.meta_description: Find the perfect smoking friendly rentals for your trip to Ribeirão das Neves Smoking friendly apartment rentals, smoking friendly house rentals, smoking friendly condo rentals, and other great vacation rentals in %{location}. Find and book unique smoking friendly rentals on Airbnb
data.text:
Guest suite in Brumadinho

5 out of 5 average rating, 121 reviews5 (121)

Morada dos Sonhos, Chalet with Fireplace (suite)

Relax in this calm and stylish space. Hosting with nature comfort. Beautiful chalet with en-suite on the slope of Serra do Rolamoça, close to the forest and waterfalls. Equipped with fireplace, smart TV, minibar and ceiling fans. Balcony with a hammock for you to take out that nice nap. Situated just over a kilometre from the central square of Casa Branca, but it doesn't miss out on the issues of tranquility and tranquility. Located in one of the most cozy neighborhoods. READ THE HOUSE RULES.

Home in Pampulha

4.9 out of 5 average rating, 104 reviews4.9 (104)

Beautiful house in Pampulha, all rooms with air cond

Take your whole family to this beautiful home with plenty of space to have fun and relax. Note when you put 16 guests you have right to have visitors and guests do not pay the extra fee This house is very comfortable, with a beautiful landscaping, several cozy and decorated environments, gourmet space with barbecue, swimming pool, Jacuzzi, quiet and tree-lined street, two garage gate, quiet neighbors, close to the Pampulha tourist complex. All rooms with air conditioning!

Loft in Pampulha

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 113 reviews4.98 (113)

Gatto family loft - Close to UFMG!

- Fully private loft in the back lot with family home (we only share the entry gates and laundry room). - The distance from the loft to various places can be found in the photo section, but you can always ask if there is any doubt! We can calculate the distance from the loft to the location of your interest. Ex: UFMG- 5 mins by car or 20 minutes walking (main entrance). Uber: between 6.00 and 9.00 (X or "Juntos"). *We have cats in the house that do not enter the loft.*

Cottage in Jaboticatubas - Serra do Cipó

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 105 reviews4.98 (105)

Casa Amarela rest and joys family and friends

House for leisure and rest, well ventilated, with a swimming pool with solar heating, a gourmet area with a barbecue with a grill, a wood stove with an oven, a pizza oven, a cooktop countertop, a portable outdoor fireplace, wifi via excellent quality cable, 04 independent rooms and 04 bathrooms to serve everyone. Entire fenced and safe area also for your pet... Located at km 55 of Mg 10, towards the Serra do Cipó. Private condominium with 24-hour security and entrance.

Cottage in Jaboticatubas

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 120 reviews4.98 (120)

Sunset House, Cottage with a Beautiful Sunset

The house is 25 m from Serra do Cipó, a great option to rest with family and friends. We included in the accommodation:wifi, bed linens, towels,pillows, bottled water, toilet paper,soap, gas,broom,squeegee,detergent. We have a container (pots and pans, cutlery, dishes, pots, knives, cups and glasses), pool, Spa, court, barbecue, cooktop and wood stove, Airfryer, electric and wood oven, microwave, sandwich maker, freezer, refrigerator, fan, iron, hairdryer, 4tvs...

Guesthouse in Brumadinho

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 125 reviews4.99 (125)

Cabana Wabi-Sabi - Casa Branca ( Brumadinho )

It is a wooden 'little house' made by hand and that seeks to share and seek balance with the context and the external landscape. SABI - the simplicity, and WABI - the stillness. A relationship of intimacy between those who feel and the environment that is felt. 40 minutes from Belo Horizonte, in the Recanto de Aldeia neighborhood, 1.5 km from the center of Casa Branca, 750m from a beautiful waterfall, great for renewing energies, and 30km from Inhotim.

Home in Belvedere

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 169 reviews4.92 (169)

BEAUTIFUL BELVEDERE HOUSE overlooking all of BH

Cozy house with 3 bedrooms in the Belvedere neighborhood, with an amazing view, differentiated design, close to BH Shopping, Biocor and Vila da Serra. Wifi, smart TV, cabinets in the bedrooms, equipped kitchen and laundry room, barbecue and an amazing pool. Easy access to the entire city, close to parks, restaurants, bars and several sights of BH. Our space is great for couples, business travelers, and families. We'll be happy to have you as our guest! ❤

Rental unit in Pampulha

4.88 out of 5 average rating, 175 reviews4.88 (175)

UFMG Apartment, Mineirão, Lagoa da Pampulha

Cozy apartment in Pampulha, prepared for home office. Close to UFMG, Mineirão, Lagoa da Pampulha and next to Av. Fleming. Smart TV, wifi, cabinets and fan in the bedrooms. Kitchen and laundry equipped for your comfort and convenience. Easy access to the Center and south, close to parks, restaurants, bars and several sights of BH. Our place is great for students and general travelers. We'll be happy to have you as our guest! ❤

Cottage in Lagoa Santa

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 127 reviews4.94 (127)

Sítio do Tôpo - Orchard Chalet

Next to a pristine forest, the Chalet has farmhouse airs and the proposal to make them feel "in the countryside", with lamps, wood stove, coffee malls, milk cans, fire pit on full moon nights, guitar, shooting stars, fireflies... Comfort of modern life is present at WiFi 400Mbs, SPA/heated pool and c/ hydro, EXCLUSIVE, smartTV 42", microwave, electric oven, misteira... (Read below for important details)

Home in Pampulha

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 240 reviews4.98 (240)

Casa - Recanto Sarandi

House in residential neighborhood, great location, cable TV + (Netflix and Prime Video), internet with 300mb/s and wifi, ideal for people who come to the city for work, study. Excellent value. 7 km from Pampulha, tourist region of Belo Horizonte, with easy access to the Mineirão stadium (UFMG), Contagem-MG, close to shopping malls, squares, restaurants and commercial areas.
